mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_writer, board_pw, board_content, board_viewCnt, board_regDate , board_title) values(#{board_no}, #{board_writer}, #{board_pw}, #{board_content}, #{board_viewCnt}, now() , #{board_title})
mapper.update: update board set board_viewCnt = board_viewCnt +1 where board_no = #{board_no}
